Method Detail

getInstance

public static Config getInstance()
Obtains the singleton instance of the app-to-app configuration.

Returns:
The singleton instance of the app-to-app configuration.

setAppToAppIdentifier

public void setAppToAppIdentifier(java.lang.String applicationId,
                                  java.lang.String applicationSecret)
Sets the application ID and secret. This restricts the applications with which this application will communicate, i.e. this can be used to communicate only with, say, one specific instance of an application.

To obtain these values, please register a Jibe Developer Account (using the Jibe Developer portal).

Parameters:
applicationId - The application identifier.
applicationSecret - The corresponding application secret.

getApplicationId

public java.lang.String getApplicationId()
Retrieves the application Id.

Returns:
The application ID (or null, if no ID has previously been set).

getApplicationSecret

public java.lang.String getApplicationSecret()
Retrieves the application secret.

Returns:
The application secret (or null, if no secret has previously been set).

isReady

public boolean isReady()
Checks whether an application ID and secret pair has been setup.

Returns:
true if both ID and secret have been set.
